name: Poison Focus
text: You know the secrets of creating especially vicious poisons.
benefit: The save DC of any poison you craft with Craft (alchemy) and any spells you cast with the poison descriptor (Pathfinder RPG Ultimate Magic 138) increases by 1. This bonus doesn’t stack with the bonus granted by Spell Focus.
text_zh: 你知道创造特别恶毒的毒药的秘密。
benefit_zh: 使用工艺（炼金术）制造的任何毒药的以及使用毒物描述符（Pathfinder RPG Ultimate Magic 138）施放的任何法术的豁免DC都会增加1。 此奖励不会与法术专攻授予的奖励叠加。
